get.description:
This API is used to get a pass for a season.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: pass data

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
49145Pass [{code}] does not exist

delete.description:
This API is used to delete a pass permanently, only draft season pass can be deleted.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=8 (DELETE)

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49145Pass [{code}] does not exist
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

patch.description:
This API is used to update a pass. Only draft season pass can be updated.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: updated pass

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49145Pass [{code}] does not exist
30141Store [{storeId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
49142Pass item does not exist in the store of namespace [{namespace}]
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

400.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
20026publisher namespace not allowed
49121Default language [{language}] required in localizations

get.summary: Query all passes for a season
get.description:
This API is used to query all passes for a season.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: the list of passes

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

post.description:
This API is used to create a pass for a draft season.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=1 (CREATE)
  • Returns: created pass

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
30141Store [{storeId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
49142Pass item does not exist in the store of namespace [{namespace}]
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

400.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
20026publisher namespace not allowed
49121Default language [{language}] required in localizations

409.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49171Invalid season status [{status}]
49174Pass [{code}] already exists in the season

get.description:
This API is used to get a reward for a season.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: reward data

49144Reward [{code}] does not exist

49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

409.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49171Season is not updatable in status [{status}]
49179Reward [{code}] is in use

patch.description:
This API is used to update a reward. Only draft season reward can be updated.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: updated reward

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: season info

49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

get.description:
This API is used to query seasons, seasons only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: the list of season basic info

post.description:
This API is used to create a season, season only allowed in non-publisher namespace.

put.description:
This API is used to retire a published season, if the season has not ended it will report error except with force.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: season info

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

put.description:
This API is used to publish a draft season, only one published season allowed at same time in a namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: published season

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
30142Published store does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
49141Tier item does not exist in the store of namespace [{namespace}]
49142Pass item does not exist in the store of namespace [{namespace}]
30341Item [{itemId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
36141Currency [{currencyCode}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]
49144Reward [{code}] does not exist

400.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
20026publisher namespace not allowed
49121Default language [{language}] required in localizations

409.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49171Invalid season status [{status}]
49172Season is already ended
49175Published season already exists in namespace [{namespace}]
49176Rewards are not provided
49177Passes are not provided
49178Tiers are not provided
49189Duplicate season name [{name}] for publishing in namespace [{namespace}]

get.description:
[SERVICE COMMUNICATION ONLY]This API is used to get current published season summary which includes previous published season summary if exists, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Returns: season summary data

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49147Published season does not exist

get.summary: Query paginated tiers for a season

This API is used to query paginated tiers for a season.

  • Returns: the list of passes

ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49143Season [{seasonId}] does not exist in namespace [{namespace}]

get.summary: Get ownership for any pass codes
get.description:
[SERVICE COMMUNICATION ONLY]This API is used to get ownership for any pass codes, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: ownership

post.description:
This API is used to grant tier to user, it will auto enroll if there's no user season but active published season exist, season only located in non-publisher namespace, otherwise ignore.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: user season data

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49148User season does not exist

get.description:
This API is used to get user season data, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: user season data

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49148User season does not exist

post.description:
This API is used to check pass or tier purchasable, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49147Published season does not exist

409.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49183Pass item does not match published season pass
49184Tier item does not match published season tier
49185Season has not started
49186Pass already owned
49187Exceed max tier count

get.description:
This API is used to get current user season progression, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: user season progression

404.description:
ErrorCodeErrorMessage
49147Published season does not exist
49148User season does not exist

delete.summary: Reset user data in current season
delete.description:
[TEST FACILITY ONLY] Forbidden in live environment. This API is used to reset user data in current season, it will not revoke the rewarded entitlements.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=8 (DELETE)

post.description:
This API is used to grant pass to user, it will auto enroll if there's no user season but active published season exist, season only located in non-publisher namespace, otherwise ignore.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: user season data

get.description:
This API is used to get user participated season data, season only located in non-publisher namespace.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=2 (READ)
  • Returns: user participated season data

post.description:
This API is used to grant exp to user, it will auto enroll if there's no user season but active published season exist, season only located in non-publisher namespace, otherwise ignore.

Other detail info:

  • Required permission: resource="ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:SEASONPASS", action=4 (UPDATE)
  • Returns: user season data

PassInfo.description: A DTO object for pass info.

devStackTrace.description: internal server error stack trace in configured environment

displayOrder.description: displayOrder for frontend to arrange the pass

PassUpdate.description: A DTO object for updating pass API call.

code.description: code, allowed characters from a-z0-9_:- and start/end in alphanumeric, max length is 255

displayOrder.description: displayOrder for frontend to arrange the pass

autoEnroll.description: autoEnroll for free pass, default false

PassCreate.description: A DTO object for creating pass API call.

namespace.description: namespace, allowed values: game namespace or publisher namespace

RewardCurrency.description: A DTO object for reward currency.

itemId.description: itemId, required when reward type is ITEM

itemType.description: itemType, required when reward type is ITEM

itemName.description: itemName, required when reward type is ITEM

itemSku.description: itemSku, required when reward type is ITEM

currency.description: currency, required when reward type is CURRENCY

quantity.description: Item quantity or Currency amount, default 1

RewardInfo.description: A DTO object for reward info.

code.description: code, allowed characters from a-z0-9_:- and start/end in alphanumeric, max length is 255

type.description: type, at current only support ITEM

itemId.description: itemId, required when reward type is ITEM, the item type should be one of: INGAMEITEM,COINS,BUNDLE

currency.description: currency, required when reward type is CURRENCY

quantity.description: Item quantity or Currency amount, default 1

RewardCreate.description: A DTO object for creating reward API call.

type.description: type, at current only support ITEM

itemId.description: itemId, required when reward type is ITEM, the item type should be one of: INGAMEITEM,COINS,BUNDLE

currency.description: currency, required when reward type is CURRENCY

quantity.description: Item quantity or Currency amount, default 1

RewardUpdate.description: A DTO object for updating reward API call.

method.description: method while excess the final tier exp

currency.description: virtual currency for grant, required while method is CURRENCY

percentPerExp.description: percent per exp, required while method is CURRENCY

defaultRequiredExp.description: default required exp for a tier

excessStrategy.description: strategy while exceed final tier exp

SeasonInfo.description: A DTO object for season info.

SeasonCloneRequest.description: A DTO object for clone season API call.

defaultLanguage.description: default language, BCP 47 language tag, default is en

defaultRequiredExp.description: default exp required for a tier

autoClaim.description: whether auto claim rewards, default true

excessStrategy.description: strategy while exceed final tier exp, default NONE

SeasonCreate.description: A DTO object for creating season API call.

ListSeasonInfo.description: A DTO object for listing season info.

defaultRequiredExp.description: default exp required for a tier

excessStrategy.description: strategy while exceed final tier exp

SeasonUpdate.description: A DTO object for updating season API call.

previous.description: previous season, only present in some situation

SeasonSummary.description: A DTO object for season summary.

requiredExp.description: required exp for tier, it will automatically use season defaultRequiredExp if not set

rewards.description: rewards map, passCode as key, rewardCode list as value

index.description: zero based tier index to be inserted at, -1 means appending to the end, default -1

TierCreate.description: A DTO object for creating tier API call.

requiredExp.description: required exp for tier, it will automatically use season defaultRequiredExp if not set

rewards.description: rewards map, passCode as key, rewardCode list as value

TierInput.description: A DTO object for tier input.

UserSeasonSummary.description: A DTO object for user season summary.

UserTierGrant.description: A DTO object for granting user tier.

toClaimRewards.description: To claim rewards, zero based tier index as key, rewards per pass as value

claimingRewards.description: Claiming rewards, zero based tier index as key, rewards per pass as value

ClaimableUserSeasonInfo.description: A DTO object for claimable user season data.

UserPurchasable.description: A DTO object for user purchasable.

passItemId.description: pass item id, required if passCode null and ignored if passCode present

passCode.description: pass code, required if passItemId null

UserPassGrant.description: A DTO object for granting user pass.

ListUserSeasonInfo.description: A DTO object for listing user season data.

UserExpGrant.description: A DTO object for granting user exp.

LocalizedPassInfo.description: A DTO object for public user retrieving pass info.

LocalizedSeasonInfo.description: A DTO object for public user retrieving season info.

toClaimRewards.description: To claim rewards, zero based tier index as key, rewards per pass as value

claimingRewards.description: Claiming rewards, zero based tier index as key, rewards per pass as value

ClaimableRewards.description: A DTO object for claimable rewards.

UserRewardClaim.description: A DTO object for claiming user reward.
